sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.text: The service was exceptional! The car was in perfect condition and the rental process was smooth and hassle-free.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.text: Best car rental experience I've had. The vehicle selection is amazing and the staff is incredibly helpful.

emma.name: Emma Davis
emma.text: Fantastic service and beautiful cars. Made my vacation even more special with their premium vehicle selection.

hero.subtitle: About MELHOR QUE NADA
hero.title: Moroccan Excellence in Car Rental
hero.description: Your trusted partner for premium car rental in Morocco. From Tangier, we redefine mobility experience with our exceptional fleet.

overview.title: MELHOR QUE NADA: More Than Rental
overview.subtitle: Our Story
overview.description: Founded with the vision to revolutionize Morocco's car rental industry, MELHOR QUE NADA has established itself as the undisputed leader in Tangier's premium sector.
overview.missionText: To provide an exceptional mobility experience by combining a premium fleet, personalized service, and unmatched local expertise for every client in Morocco.
overview.locationDesc: Strategically located in the heart of Tangier

values.title: What Defines Us
values.subtitle: At MELHOR QUE NADA, our core values guide our approach and shape the experience we provide to every customer.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Our love for automobiles and service excellence guides every decision we make.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We commit to providing safe vehicles and consistent service you can count on.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every aspect of our service, from booking to return.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Every customer is unique and deserves personalized attention tailored to their specific needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace the latest technologies to continuously improve the customer experience.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We commit to our community and environment through sustainable practices.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: MELHOR QUE NADA commits to upholding these values in every interaction, ensuring a car rental experience that exceeds your expectations on every journey.

team.title: Human Excellence
team.subtitle: Behind every exceptional experience at MELHOR QUE NADA stands a dedicated team of passionate professionals.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our team has deep knowledge of both Moroccan and international automotive markets.

personalizedService.title: Personalized Service
personalizedService.description: Every team member is trained to provide tailored service adapted to your needs.

availability.title: Continuous Availability
availability.description: Our team is available 24/7 to assist you at any time during your rental.

team.departmentsDesc: Each department works in harmony to provide you with a complete and seamless experience.

customerService.name: Customer Service
customerService.description: Your first contact with MELHOR QUE NADA

fleetManagement.name: Fleet Management
fleetManagement.description: Maintenance and quality of our vehicles

promise.title: Our Team Promise
promise.description: We commit to accompanying you at every step of your journey with MELHOR QUE NADA, putting our expertise and passion at the service of your satisfaction.

contact.title: Find Us in Tangier
contact.subtitle: Visit our showroom in Tangier or contact us for any questions. Our team is here to help you.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subtitle: We'll get back to you quickly
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
